name: Manus Dei
description:
Every 100 years a sacrifice from the Holy Order is deemed worthy to wield the Manus Dei and descend into the Gate to stop the overflowing tide of fiends from the Rift. Release the limiter on the Manus Dei to chew through your enemies. Every fiber of your being will be tested. The more demons you slay, the higher your score.

Features
  • Tight shooting mechanics, with recognizable impact
  • Use your weapon to boost yourself across the map, with wall jumping, bunny hopping, and more
  • Steam leaderboards so you can see who among you is the worthiest sacrifice
